LUC - Static variable in class uk.ac.brighton.uni.ab607.mmorpg.common.GameCharacter
These allow convenient access to GameCharacter.attributes and GameCharacter.stats arrays to retrieve particular attribute value These essentially represent indexes Note: the order is based on the order of attributes in Attribute and Stat enums, so they have to match
